other_tests.findings: Unusually thick nerve bundles with increased tortuosity in the papillary and mid dermis; cytoplasmic positivity for S-100 protein.
Small, amorphous deposits in the papillary dermis stained positively for amyloid with Congo red stain and were yellow-green birefringent in polarized light.
Histopathology showed two foci of medullary thyroid carcinoma in the left and right lobes; no metastasis was found.
Mutation within exon 13 of the RET proto-oncogene (Glu 768 Asp); no mutation detected in exons 10 and 11.
